thought: The current action_1 (gmail send) function is not setting the required params for sending email, which causes the workflow execution error. The params must be set properly with 'to', 'subject', 'text' (or 'html') keys from the input data. I will rewrite action_1 to map the input_data fields to the correct params keys for Gmail send action.
plan: Rewrite action_1 to set params with 'to', 'subject', 'text' extracted from input_data json keys.
Test action_1 alone with sample input_data to verify email sending works.
Fix any further issues if needed.
criticism: Currently, action_1 does not set required params for Gmail send action, causing the workflow to fail with execution error.
